Verses: 1 sagodharare, Naangal Ungalidaththil Piravesiththadhu Veenaayirukkavillaiyendru Neengale Arindhirukkireergal.

2 ungalukkuth Therindhirukkirapadi, Munne Pilippipattanaththile Naangal Paadupattu Nindhaiyadaindhirundhum, Vegu Poraattaththode Dhevanudaiya Suviseshaththai Ungalukku Sollumpadi, Nammudaiya Dhevanukkul Dhairiyankondirundhom.
3 engal Podhagam Vanjagaththinaalum Thuraasaiyinaalum Undaagavillai, Adhu Kabadamulladhaayumirukkavillai.

4 suviseshaththai Engalidaththil Oppuvikkaththakkadhaai, Dhevan Engalai Uththamarendrenninapadiye, Naangal Manusharukku Alla, Engal Irudhayangalai Sodhiththarigira Dhevanukke Piriyamundaagap Pesugirom.
5 ungalukkuth Therindhirukkirapadi, Naangal Orukkaalum Ichchagamaana Vasanangalai Sollavumillai, Porulaasaiyullavargalaai Maayampannavumillai; Dhevane Saatchi.
6 naangal Kiristhuvin Apposthalaraaga Ungalukkup Baaramaayirukkakkoodiyavargalaanaalum, Ungalidaththilaavadhu, Matravargalidaththilaavadhu, Manusharaal Varum Magimaiyai Naangal Thedavillai.
7 ungalidaththil Patchamaai Nadandhukondom; Paal Kodukkira Thaayaanaval Than Pillaigalaik Kaappaatrugiradhupola,

8 naangal Ungalmel Vaanjaiyaayirundhu, Dhevanudaiya Suviseshaththai Ungalukkuk Koduththadhumallaamal, Neengal Engalukkup Piriyamaanavargalaanapadiyinaale, Engal Jeevanaiyum Ungalukkuk Kodukka Manadhaayirundhom.

9 sagodharare, Naangal Patta Pirayaasamum Varuththamum Ungalukku Gnaapagamaayirukkum; Ungalil Oruvanukkum Baaramaayiraadhapadikku, Iravum Pagalum Naangal Velaiseydhu, Dhevanudaiya Suviseshaththai Ungalidaththil Pirasangiththom.
10 visuvaasigalaagiya Ungalukkulle Naangal Evvalavu Parisuththamum Needhiyum Pizhaiyinmaiyumaai Nadandhomenpadharku Neengalum Saatchi, Dhevanum Saatchi.
11 melum, Thammudaiya Raajyaththirkum Magimaikkum Ungalai Azhaiththa Dhevanukku Neengal Paaththiraraai Nadakkavendumendru,
12 thagappan Than Pillaigalukku Sollugiradhupola, Naangal Ungalil Ovvoruvanukkum Buththiyum Therudhalum Echcharippum Sonnadhai Arindhirukkireergal.

13 aagaiyaal, Neengal Dhevavasanaththai Engalaale Kelvippattu Etrukkondapodhu, Adhai Manushar Vasanamaaga Etrukkollaamal, Dhevavasanamaagave Etrukkondadhinaale Naangal Idaividaamal Dhevanukku Sthoththiranjseluththugirom; Adhu Meyyaagave Dhevavasanandhaan, Visuvaasikkira Ungalukkulle Adhu Belanum Seygiradhu.

14 eppadiyenil, Sagodharare, Yoodheyaa Dhesaththil Kiristhu Yesuvukkullaana Dhevanudaiya Sabaigalai Neengal Pinbatrinavargalaagi, Avargal Yoodharaale Eppadip Paadupattaargalo, Appadiye Neengalum Ungal Suya Janangalaale Paadupatteergal.

15 andha Yoodhargal Karththaraagiya Yesuvaiyum, Thangal Theerkkadharisigalaiyum Kolaiseydhavargalum, Engalaith Thunbappaduththinavargalum, Dhevanukkerkaadhavargalum, Manushar Yaavarukkum Virodhigalumaayirundhu,

16 purajaadhiyaar Ratchikkappaduvadharku Naangal Avargalode Pesaadhapadikkuth Thadaipannugiraargal; Ivvidhamaai Ekkaalaththilum Thangal Paavangalai Niraivaakkugiraargal; Avargalmel Kobaakkinai Pooranamaai Vandhirukkiradhu.

17 sagodharare, Naangal Irudhayaththinpadi Ungalodirundhu, Sareeraththinpadi Konjakkaalam Ungalaivittup Pirindhirundhapadiyinaale, Ungal Mugaththaippaarkkavendumendru Migundha Aasaiyode Adhigamaaip Pirayaththanampanninom.
18 aagaiyaal, Naangal Ungalidaththilvara Irandorudharam Manadhaayirundhom, Pavulaagiya Naane Vara Manadhaayirundhen; Saaththaano Engalaith Thadaipanninaan.

19 engalukku Nambikkaiyum Sandhoshamum Magizhchchiyin Kireedamumaayiruppavargal Yaar? Nammudaiyakarththaraagiya Yesukiristhu Varumbodhu Avarudaiya Sannidhaanaththile Neengalallavaa Appadiyiruppeergal;
20 neengale Engalukku Magimaiyum Sandhoshamumaayirukkireergal.
